title: BOTS
body: Can we not have all champions to be BOTS, because what if i wanted to Vs a Yasuo or Zed as BOT!!!!

replies.body: how bout git gud and stop versing bots and go fight some challengers playing yasuo and zed

Yeah, poorly worded. However, I think there needs to be more bot AIs, at least for some of the more popular champions. It would be good, because when people first go into PvP they would have more knowledge of champions.
it took me like a good 5mins of re reading that to realise that i should stop trying...
